scripts.create-diff:win: @powershell -Command "git diff --cached -- . ':^node_modules' ':^package-lock.json' ':^src/app/fonts' ':^public' | Out-File -FilePath $env:USERPROFILE\Desktop\diff.txt; git ls-files --others --exclude-standard ':!node_modules/*' ':!package-lock.json' ':!src/app/fonts/*' ':!public/*' | ForEach-Object { Write-Output ('+++ ' + $_); Get-Content $_ } | Out-File -FilePath $env:USERPROFILE\Desktop\diff.txt -Append"
